attributes.action: Mandatory face Masks/shields for everyone (no exception) outside all times
attributes.additional_details: This needs to be considered and debated to seriously help prevent the spread of COVID-19 as current measures are unreliable and the exception clause is medically unfounded and flouted by many
attributes.background: To help prevent the spread of COVID-19, every person regardless of age or health condition should wear a face covering/mask or face shield. There is growing medical evidence to support this intervention and as current measures have been ineffective this now needs to be attempted.
